summary: This mod lowers the HP values of many bandit and draugr NPCs.
descriptionHtml:
Isn\'t it annoying that Bandit Chiefs have quadruple amount of HP compared to the regular bandits?
And, that they\'re almost impossible to beat with master difficulty and low level?
This mod aims to fix that!

This mod tries to balance enemies at master difficulty, and usage of 
general balancing mods like: \"incremental difficulty\" is highly recommended!

What does the mod change?
-Reduced the LVL and HP of all bandit bosses by 20-40%.
-Reduced the LVL and HP of all draugr bosses by 20-40%.

Possible problems:
-May conflict with another mods changing the HP or STAT values of the specific NPCs.

FAQ:

Q: This makes everything way too easy!
A: Are you playing with the master difficulty?

Q: NPCs are still too hard to beat!
A: Let me know what your level is, and the exact location of the NPC you found impossible to beat.

Q: I am playing with master difficulty and pwn draugr and bandit bosses like nothing..
A: Let me know what your level is, and the exact location of the NPC you found too easy to beat.

Q: I haven\'t noticed any difference.
A: This mod only affects \"bosses\" or \"chiefs\". Also, try to change the priority of the plugin.
author: Lethalo

files.name: Realistic NPC Health
files.changelogHtml:
Changed the HP values of all bandit bosses included in the skyrim.esm
Changed the HP values of all draugr bosses included in the skyrim.esm
Also changed some LVLs of the bandits and draugrs.
